"Cristobal": "Excellent work. I'll check them out right away."
"...Alright, everything looks good."
"We only need the data, so you're welcome to hold on to what you've gathered."
"What did you think? Not an easy job, was it?"
"It's our mission to do stuff like this over and over again."
"It would be far more efficient if we had a transport truck, and a greater number of people for the task."
"But there's no way they've got trucks to spare for such a small group as ours."
"All we can do is move forward on our own two legs."
"In any event, I really appreciate your help."
"If anything comes up, I'll give you a call. Hope I can count on you again."
"With someone as hard-working as you on the team, we'd have a much easier time of things."
"But complaining's not gonna help. I've gotta do whatever I can as leader."
"Hey, I've heard about your work here."
"Looks like you've gotten acclimated to the region, and all the kind of work we have to do around here."
"Our mission's been proceeding well. We're slowly expanding the scope of things too."
"Although, we're short on people as always. I don't think we'll ever be caught up."
"What do you say? How about lending a hand one more time."
"You can show me just how much you've learned here. You'd be helping us out a lot."
"Central Kvaris is teeming with much stronger enemies than the southern reaches."
"Take care out there."
"That's alright, don't worry about it. Come on back if you change your mind."
"Excellent work."
"I've watched the way you fight through your Mag, and it's really something else."
"There aren't many ARKS who can fight as well as you."
"Kvaris may have made you even stronger."
"Almost reminds me of him..."
"Ah, sorry. Just mumbling to myself."
"When I look at you, I get reminded of the past. When I was still young."
"Heh, now I sound like a wistful old man. I'm still an ARKS in his prime."
"Anyway, thanks again for your help. I hope you'll continue to help us out."
"How goes it? Starting to miss being back home?"
"All of our members from Retem have been grumbling about how they miss the desert."
"You should head back to Aelio once in a while and take a break too."
"But uh, on an unrelated note... what would you say to helping us out some more?"
"We're going to be starting expeditions into northern Kvaris now. We're going to need as many hands as we can get."
"The more we expand our operations, the harder it becomse to get things done. It's a real predicament."
"We're relying on you to get this done. I've already sent the details to your Mag."
"Ah, guess you're preoccupied. Maybe next time."
"Excellent work. I'll compile the data now."
"...Everything looks good."
"Wouldn't expect anything less from the ARKS who survived that DOLLS attack on Aelio Town. Perfectly done."
"Hm? Why the surprise? Were you unaware that I knew?"
"You may not have realized it, but you're pretty famous among the ARKS."
"Everyone's been praising your bravery in battle and all the feats you've accomplished. I wanted to see just how accurate the rumors were."
"To be honest, I was actually testing you with all those missions."
"But after seeing the results you've managed, there's no more doubt left in my mind."
"You're an even greater ARKS than the rumors let on."
"I hope you'll continue to aid us here. Thanks for all the help."
"Just the person I wanted to see. Things are a bit hectic, think you can lend a hand again?"
"This time will be a little different from before. I'm at wit's end here."
"It won't be easy, but you'd be doing us a massive favor."
"I would go myself, but I'm not able to leave the came at all."
"Sorry to put this on your shoulders, but I trust you."
"I see... I'm sure you must have your reasons."
